content:
addRule()
	.when(FileContent.from(null).matches({prefixes}flo-editor).inFilesNamed({*}
		.{extensions}).as(default)
)
	.perform(Iteration.over(?).perform(Hint.titled("Spring Flo is not supported by Quarkus")
			.withText("
                            Spring Flo Javascript library has been detected.  
                            This is used in conjunction with Spring Cloud Data F
			low which is not supported in Quarkus  
                            The link below will take to Quarkus Guides where you
			 can check if there are alternatives for your use case.
                            ").withEffort(13).with([Link.to(https://quarkus
			.io/guides/).titled(Quarkus - Guides)]))
)
withId("springboot-flo-to-quarkus-groovy-00000")
